Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory692.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'After the last security robot fell to their blades, a brief moment of silence has returned to the empty lab.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Two of them start to check undamaged documents on the desks and terminals while maintaining a certain distance in between.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "What's this...", 4: '2'}
{3: "A report has caught Alpha's attention."}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Hah... How ironic...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "What's the matter?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Read it for yourself.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Alpha hands over the report.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'City 023, Conservation Area 112, Depot D56... These are all small-scale bases destroyed by Hetero-Creatures.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Hetero-Creatures weren't the only things behind those deaths.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The attacks... They had planned everything...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As Lucia reads through the detailed attack plans, her hand starts to shake uncontrollably.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Only in a chaotic environment can they accomplish their shady businesses.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'They also need more missing persons for their experiments.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Alpha activated the self-destruction program of the cultivation tanks. Without a sound, the test subjects have dissolved in the transparent liquid.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What are you doing?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Alpha looks at her other self on the other side of the cultivation tank. Through the rippling liquid, Lucia's reflection gradually merges with her own."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3401_18.jpg'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'I was giving them a peaceful ending. Do you want them to continue serving Project Winter in these forms?'}
{3: 'Without a word, Lucia puts away the report.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Rest in peace.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Submitting this report won't do anything to those people behind the curtain. It will only bring trouble to yourself instead."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But that doesn't mean I should let this darkness continue to spread."}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "It will continue to feed on mankind's greed. As long as humans still long for the Ascension-Network, your efforts will only be futile."}
{3: 'Alpha lets out a self-mocking laugh.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Even the specialized frames that helped you through the crisis were the product of these plans, weren't they?"}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I still don't think that's right."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "The past mistakes can't be corrected, but it doesn't mean we should continue doing the wrong things."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I don't think the situation is bad enough for us to give up all the good things."}
